page.title: 12Education
page.content: Netherton Northside County First School is run under a Joint-Headship with Harbottle Church of England Aided First School. There is a full-time Assistant Teacher in each school,Mrs. Hedley at Netherton and Mrs. Carr at Harbottle. Mr. Taylor the Headteacher halves each day between the schools, alternating mornings and afternoons week by week. Every Wednesday, and every Tuesday morning in the Winter months when the baths at Rothbury School are closed down, the older children from Harbottle school come across here. Other activities are combined :- Summer Outing, Pantomime and other theatre visits, School Camp, Sports day and Educational Visits mainly by the older children. Parents join in on many of these activities.
